titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the Internal Revenue Service to prescribe and update a standard mileage rate for the charitable use of a passenger automobile.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/13/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the standard mileage rate for use of a passenger automobile for purposes of computing charitable deductions.
